name: BSO
comment:
>>44509912
>>44509936
>>44509870
>>44509868
You didn’t have a lot to eat yesterday, come to think of it. You gulp down a glass of room-temperature water and fill another one, setting it aside while you warm up a bagel—you’re getting down to your last couple—and open up the fridge. Thankfully you’ve got most of a leftover pizza from the day before break started. It’s debatable whether or not the ensemble qualifies as food, but most important to you right now is keeping yourself on your feet.

You’re ravenous, and a bit tired; somehow, you get the feeling that playing BSO doesn’t exactly allow your brain to rest like sleeping, which would mean you’ve been up for a good deal longer than you’d have liked to be.

You are loud and unsubtle, but nothing in the apartment seems to react to your presence or the beeping of the microwave.

> Write-in.
> Play Broken Sky Online.
